articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Ready to Reject Efforts to Kick Trump Off the Ballot
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from across the ideological spectrum expressed deep skepticism about Colorado's decision to disqualify Trump under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: Microsoft's AI Chief Leaves to Launch New AI Venture
articles.description: Sam Altman's former OpenAI colleague Mustafa Suleyman is departing Microsoft to start an AI company called Inflection 2.0, taking several key Microsoft AI researchers with him.

articles.title: King Charles III Diagnosed With Cancer, Buckingham Palace Says
articles.description: The palace announced that King Charles has begun treatment for an unspecified form of cancer discovered during his recent prostate procedure, though will continue state business and paperwork.
